 2022-10792022-10-07,  CH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of A. CHRISTIAN IDICULA of Edmonton, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
